chart_description: The windows.cpu_core_dpcs chart displays the number of Deferred Procedure Calls (DPC) received and serviced per second on each CPU core. DPCs are a mechanism for higher-priority tasks to defer lower-priority tasks, allowing for smoother system performance.

dimension_descriptions.dpcs: The number of Deferred Procedure Calls (DPC) received and serviced per second on each CPU core.
